channel.title: Comments on: Bonnaroo: Read the fine print

item.title: By: that_spazz_guy
item.dc:creator: that_spazz_guy
item.description:
Yeah, we get it. You hate the hippies.
Might I suggest leaving your attitude at home next year, or better yet, just don't come if you hate being around us so damn much.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, we get it. You hate the hippies.

Might I suggest leaving your attitude at home next year, or better yet, just don’t come if you hate being around us so damn much.

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: I saw Elvis Perkins open for Okkervil River last year and was very pleasantly surprised at how much I enjoyed his set.
item.content:encoded: I saw Elvis Perkins open for Okkervil River last year and was very pleasantly surprised at how much I enjoyed his set.
